casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Derrick Tyrone SHELTON. No. 538P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Derrick Tyrone Shelton, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 20th day of January 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Pitt County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
